name: Domino Effect •
description:
Ever wanted to create your own Domino Show? With Domino Effect you draw a path over a real surface and when you are done, Domino Effect will place virtual realistic dominoes on it. You are now ready to topple your dominoes and enjoy a fun and realistic Domino Show!

• Realistic dominoes with configurable textures and colors.
• Number of dominoes is calculated depending on the length of the path you draw.
• Physically accurate simulation.
• You can repeat the same Domino Show as many times as you want. You can view it from any angle you want.
• Beautiful and original organic, inorganic, plastic and metal domino materials.
• Organic materials: wood, leather, jute, grass and reptile.
• Inorganic materials: marble, granite, glass, rusted metal and pebbles.
• Metal materials: gold, silver and copper.
• Multiple colors for plastic material.
• Easy to follow instructions for surface and domino configuration.

Any questions or comments, contact us at azul3dapps@gmail.com
